main_definition: Hands are the part of a human body located at the ends of their arms, used for various functions such as grasping, manipulating objects, and expressing emotions.

meanings_and_examples.example: She washed her hands before preparing food.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An expression of willingness or compliance
meanings_and_examples.example: He shook my hand to show he agreed with me.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To give someone the opportunity or responsibility for a task
meanings_and_examples.example: The manager handed over the project responsibilities to his team members.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A gesture indicating agreement or acceptance
meanings_and_examples.example: When I finished my presentation, everyone in the room nodded and shook hands with me.
